content.p: Courses at the School of Education Following in the footsteps of one of the largest and most established education departments of a UK university, we at The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus continue to initiate you in innovative teaching and learning methods and quality research. Our programmes are designed with a insightful blend of traditional and emerging educational theory and pedagogy. The Nottingham education degree is an internationally recognised brand of world class education. Nottingham graduates are hugely in demand to occupy all sectors of the education industry. telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
